ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PY_Contact', OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(Phone, "^((\\+)?\\d{1,16})?$")), NOT(REGEX(Phone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "^((\\+)?\\d{1,16})?$")), NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPhone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(OtherPhone, "^((\\+)?\\d{1,16})?$")), NOT(REGEX(OtherPhone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ) ), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: El valor ingresado no es valido
